[00:00.00]It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year - Andy Williams (安迪·威廉姆斯)
[00:19.75]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:25.88]With the kids jingle belling
[00:29.31]And everyone telling you "Be of good cheer"
[00:32.56]
[00:33.69]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:40.31]
[00:40.88]It's the hap-happiest season of all
[00:46.38]
[00:48.00]With those holiday greetings and gay happy meetings
[00:51.88]When friends come to call
[00:55.00]It's the hap-happiest season of all
[01:02.25]There'll be parties for hosting
[01:04.31]Marshmallows for toasting
[01:05.75]And caroling out in the snow
[01:09.06]There'll be scary ghost stories
[01:11.19]And tales of the glories of
[01:13.00]Christmases long  long ago
[01:17.50]
[01:18.19]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:24.19]
[01:25.13]There'll be much mistltoeing
[01:26.25]And hearts will be glowing
[01:28.31]When love ones are near

data.trans:
[ti:It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:NOW That's What I Call Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:19.75]这是一年中最美好的时刻
[00:25.87]孩子们唱着铃铛歌
[00:29.31]每个人都在告诉你
[00:32.56]
[00:33.69]这是一年中最美好的时刻
[00:40.31]
[00:40.88]这是最幸福的季节
[00:46.38]
[00:48.00]大家都在互相致以节日的问候，还会开着欢乐的家庭聚会
[00:51.88]朋友们也都会来拜访
[00:55.00]这是最幸福的季节
[01:02.25]将会有派对被举行
[01:04.31]还有祝节日快乐的棉花糖
[01:05.75]在雪地里，大家唱着圣诞歌
[01:09.06]也会有人讲吓人的鬼故事
[01:11.19]还有很久很久之前的
[01:13.00]关于圣诞节的辉煌故事
[01:17.50]
[01:18.19]这是一年中最美好的时刻
[01:24.19]
[01:25.12]将会有很多令人难忘的事情
[01:26.25]每个人的心都焕发光彩
[01:28.31]当爱的人靠近时
[01:31.06]
[01:32.00]这是一年中最美好的时刻
[01:38.79]
[01:46.98]将会有派对被举行

[02:02.96]
